divs: Sighting DetailsWe originally saw the object from our home, and since it was just hovering there with flashing lights in a manner weve never seen before as noted in video 1, we decided to drive to the location where we would be directly underneath it, as noted from video 2. From here we just watched for awhile in fascination until it ascended upwards until it was no longer visible. There were no sounds, only the lights that were flashing in a very coordinated fashion. I know Luke Air-Force Base is close-by, but it didnt look or sound like any plane Ive ever seen before, though I dont want to rule anything out. At first we believed it could have been a helicopter, but it didnt have either the shape or the sound, so thats what led us to drive a bit closer to get a better look. Anyways, see for yourself and Id be interested to know what you think.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 19th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: It just hovered for awhile and then ascended until it was no longer visible.
